name: Colorful Icons
description: Make all icons use your player colors

hide-locks.name: Hide Locks
hide-locks.description: Hide lock icons in the icon kit.

dim-unobtainable.name: Dim Unobtainable Icons
dim-unobtainable.description: Dim icons that are currently unobtainable (can be unlocked in 2.21). Doesn't apply to icons from unavailable gauntlets and Wraith codes.
